section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: “Applicant” means an individual who has filed an application for employment with a public employer or who has filed an application or made a verbal request to serve in a volunteer position with a public employer.
“Covered position” means a position in which a criminal background check is required by law.

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 31, 2011, D.C. Law 18-340, § 2(b), 58 DCR 621
